name: The Outpost
description:
Defend Against Steampunk Robot Wasps Using Mirrors and a laser cannon.

Features:

-Awesome 3D Graphics powered by Unreal Engine 4

-Fast paced action

-Interactive tutorial

-High Scores (Yay!)

Controls:

-Mouse . . . . . . . . . Look around

-Right Click. . . . . Select enemies/Laser mirrors

-Left Click. . . . . . .Attack

-Space. . . . . . . . . . .Super Area Weapon (S.A.W.)

Known Issues:

-You have to complete the tutorial to select enemies in survival mode.

-No more issues! (I'm bored)

If you enjoyed the game let me know, and I might try adding a campaign mode.

Have Fun! -Jacob777
